## Overview

This is a set of free to use blockout textures to make level prototypes.

## Sizes

- [x] 64
- [x] 128 + svg
- [x] 256
- [x] 512
- [x] 1024

## Types

- [x] Check
- [x] Cross
- [x] Dots
- [x] Grid

## Colors

- [x] Black
- [x] Gray
- [x] White
- [x] Red + Light
- [x] Orange + Light
- [x] Yellow + Light
- [x] Green + Light
- [x] Aqua + Light
- [x] Blue + Light
- [x] Purple + Light
